title: 2015 Big East Conference Men's Soccer Tournament
text:
The 2015 Big East Men's Soccer Tournament, was the third men's soccer tournament of the <a href="Big%20East%20Conference">new Big East Conference</a>, formed in July 2013 after the <a href="Big%20East%20Conference%20%281979%E2%80%932013%29">original Big East Conference</a> <a href="2010%E2%80%9313%20Big%20East%20Conference%20realignment">split into two leagues</a> along <a href="College%20football">football</a> lines. Including the history of the original conference, it was the 20th edition of the Big East tournament.
Qualification.
The top six teams in the Big East Conference based on their conference regular season records qualified for the tournament.
